TypeTeamMember.biography: Sonja is the Vice President, Platform Partnerships at TripleLift, leading a global team covering 80+ demand-side platforms (DSPs), audience networks and other platform partners. Prior to joining TripleLift in 2016, she led publisher development at ad-tech startup Virool. Sonja originally hails from Vancouver, Canada, where she spent 6 years working for the Vancouver Canucks (NHL) in sales, service and digital media.
